description:
To become a full-fledged adventurer, Fran must pass an intimidating test. But even if she passes, will other adventurers give a lowly cat-girl a chance to fit in?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Boukensha Guild ni Ittara Oni Shikenkan Deshita
L`examinateur impitoyable de la guilde des aventuriers
The Hellish Trial at the Adventurer`s Guild
冒険者ギルドに行ったら鬼試験官でした
